name: TTV4
description:
TTV4 is the latest volume of the retro hardcore maze wanderer minigame series Trip to Vinelands.
Made by the same developer of the arcade series UBERMOSH, TTV4 puts your reflexes and concentration to the test.

Each run is a bit different, exit the screen avoiding vines, blades, and spikes. Beat a hundred mazes.

The maze wanderer minigame series Trip to Vinelands started in 2016, polishing the challenge with each new volume, guided by an awesome retro hardcore community and priceless players' feedback.
